description: Do Not Modify. Generated by Event Schema Generator v1.0.15 on 2020-Jun-15 08:03:33

SessionId.description: Units: Count. A lifetime counter incremented on the start of a drive session. This ID uniquely defines a drive session for this telemetry device. The ID may be referenced by other events.

FuelCell_SerialNumber.description: The unique serial number of the Fuel Cell currently connected to the telemetry device. It is assumed the telemetry device is mounted to a truck that is powered by the fuel cell.

FuelCell_DateTime_MeterStart.description: Units: DateTime in UTC. Date and Time in UTC of the start of the fuel cell meter change summary event.

FuelCell_MeterDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Duration of the fuel cell meter change summary event.

FuelCell_OperatingHours.description: Units: Seconds. The time the Fuel Cell spent operating over its lifetime.

FuelCell_HydrogenConsumed.description: Units: grams. The amount of Hydrogen Consumed by the Fuel Cell over its lifetime.

FuelCell_EnergyOutput.description: Units: Wh. The amount of energy output by the Fuel Cell over its lifetime. The energy output is calculated from stack current and voltage and ultracap voltage and estimate of balance of plant.

FuelCell_IdleMeter.description: Units: Seconds. The time the Fuel Cell spent powered on but not in use (i.e. idle) over its lifetime.

FuelCell_ReFuelCount.description: Units: Count. The total number of times the Fuel Cell has been re-fueled over its lifetime.

FuelCell_SessionCount.description: Units: Count. The total number of times the Fuel Cell has transitioned from Start Mode to Run Mode over its lifetime.

FuelCell_OperatingHours_Delta.description: Units: Seconds. The change in the Fuel Cell Operating Hour Meter since the last Fuel Cell Meter event was logged.

FuelCell_HydrogenConsumed_Delta.description: Units: grams. The change in the Fuel Cell Hydrogen Consumed Meter since the last Fuel Cell Meter event was logged.

FuelCell_EnergyOutput_Delta.description: Units: Wh. The change in Fuel Cell Energy Output Meter since the last Fuel Cell Meter event was logged.

FuelCell_IdleMeter_Delta.description: Units: Seconds. The change in Fuel Cell Idle Meter since the last Fuel Cell Meter event was logged.

FuelCell_ReFuelCount_Delta.description: Units: Count. The change in Fuel Cell Re-Fuel Count since the last Fuel Cell Meter event was logged.

FuelCell_SessionCount_Delta.description: Units: Count. The change in Fuel Cell Session Count since the last Fuel Cell Meter event was logged.

OperatorId.description: ID of operator currently logged onto the asset / telemetry device.

FacilityCode.description: ID embedded in operator access card, normally referred to as site or facility code. Helps to determine which operator is currently logged onto the asset / telemetry device.
